Localization.Name: Carnita-ritas Burrito
Localization.Description:
NDR: 38
Effects: Dehydrating

Torpedo Burrito crams a full payload of flavor into their devastatingly delicious Carnita-rita burrito, featuring sweet and tangy pulled pork wrapped in their signature size-4 multi-grain tortilla.
